backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types (GiftPack, Cart, Order, UserProfile, Coupon, etc.) and in-memory Map storage for gift packs, orders, payments, user carts, coupons, and contact submissions with included MixinStorage and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: clickable GiftPackCard navigation, GiftPackDetailPage creation, and route registration for '/gift-pack/:id' pattern, all with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages including routing, cart management with bigint quantities, checkout with Razorpay integration, admin authentication, and responsive layouts.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Razorpay checkout script inclusion and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router configuration for all routes (home, catalog, gift pack detail, custom, cart, checkout, order confirmation, profile, contact, admin), AdminAuthProvider wrapper, automatic data initialization, and login/logout handlers that sync or clear cart.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryFo: React Hook Form-based category creation/editing form with name and description fields, validation, loading states, and cancel functionality for edit mode.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryLi: Category list display component with loading skeletons, empty state handling, and optional edit button for each category card.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Manages category creation and editing with a form and list view, using custom hooks for data fetching and mutations, and displays toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/CouponForm: React Hook Form-based coupon creation/editing form with fields for code, discount percentage, min/max discount constraints, expiration date, and quantity, with validation and auto-uppercase code formatting.
frontend/src/components/admin/CouponList: Displays a grid of coupon cards showing code, discount details, quantity remaining, expiration date, and status badges (Active/Expired/Sold Out) with optional edit functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/CouponMana: Orchestrates coupon CRUD operations by combining CouponForm and CouponList components, handling create/update mutations and managing edit state with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/GiftPackFo: Comprehensive gift pack form with fields for ID, title, description, price, discount, category, basket type, size, and multiple image URLs using react-hook-form with field arrays.
frontend/src/components/admin/GiftPackLi: Displays gift packs in a responsive grid with image previews, badges for category/type/size, pricing info, and action buttons for edit/delete with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/GiftPackMa: Coordinates gift pack CRUD operations by combining GiftPackForm and GiftPackList, managing edit state and delegating mutations to custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Modal dialog component that displays detailed information about a specific order, including status, payment info, items, delivery address, and special instructions. Allows admins to update order status via a dropdown select.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderFilte: Filter component for orders with search by order ID/customer name, status dropdown, and date range picker. Manages filter state and notifies parent component of changes with clear filters functionality.
Displays a list of orders as clickable cards showing order ID, date, customer name, item count, total amount, and status badges. Opens OrderDetailModal when an order is clicked.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Main order management component that combines OrderFilters and OrderList, fetching all orders and applying client-side filtering by search term, status, and date range.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentDet: Modal dialog displaying detailed payment information including transaction ID, amount, status, payment method, payer details, and associated order information if available.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentFil: Filter component for payments with search by transaction ID, payment status dropdown (success/pending/failed), and date range picker. Manages filter state and notifies parent of changes.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentLis: Displays a grid of payment cards with transaction details (ID, amount, payer, status) and opens a detail modal on click. Shows loading skeletons or empty state when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentMan: Main payment management component that fetches payments, applies filters (search, status, date range), and renders the filtered payment list. Handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: React Hook Form-based product form for creating/editing products with fields for ID, name, description, price, category, and multiple image URLs. Supports dynamic image field array management.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductLis: Displays a grid of product cards with images, details, and edit/delete actions. Shows loading skeletons, error alerts, or empty state when no products exist.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Orchestrates product CRUD operations with create/update/delete mutations, manages form visibility and editing state, and displays success/error toasts. Renders ProductForm and ProductList components.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedAd: Authentication guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login page and shows a loading spinner during auth check. Renders children only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartItemRow: Renders a single cart item with product image, title, pricing (with discount), quantity controls, custom message/wrapping display, and remove button. Calculates and displays item total.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSummary: Displays cart summary with subtotal, GST, and total price, including a button to proceed to checkout. Shows loading skeleton while gift packs data is being fetched.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Address: Form component for entering delivery address with real-time pincode validation and serviceability checking. Pre-fills fields from user profile and validates phone and pincode before submission.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays order summary at checkout showing items, subtotal, coupon discount (if applied), GST, and total price. Shows loading skeleton while gift packs data is being fetched.
frontend/src/components/customization/Ba: Allows users to select a basket type (wicker basket, wooden crate, or gift box) with visual cards showing icons and descriptions for each option.
frontend/src/components/customization/It: Grid of selectable gift items with a maximum selection limit, showing mock items with prices and categories. Displays alert for selection count and disables items when limit is reached.
frontend/src/components/customization/Me: Text area form for adding an optional personalized message to the gift with a 200-character limit and remaining character counter.
frontend/src/components/customization/Pa: Allows users to select a packing style (classic wrap, premium wrap, gold ribbon, or silver ribbon) with visual cards showing color-coded icons for each option.
Sticky sidebar preview showing the custom pack configuration including basket type, size, selected items with prices, packing style, message card, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/components/customization/Pe: File appears to be empty or truncated in the provided content.
frontend/src/components/customization/Si: Displays a grid of selectable gift basket size cards (Small, Medium, Large) with capacity, description, and price information. Highlights the selected size with a terracotta ring border.
frontend/src/components/customization/St: Renders a horizontal progress indicator for a 5-step customization flow (Basket Type, Size, Products, Packing, Message). Shows completed steps with checkmarks, current step highlighted, and connecting lines between steps.
Provides Back and Next navigation buttons for multi-step forms. Disables Back on first step and Next when canProceed is false.
frontend/src/components/delivery/Pincode: Card component that validates and checks pincode serviceability via backend actor. Displays success/error messages with icons and handles 6-digit pincode input validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with four columns (About, Quick Links, Delivery Info, Social) and copyright notice. Includes navigation links, social media icons, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo, navigation menu, pincode checker popover, cart badge, and authentication controls. Includes mobile menu sheet and conditional admin link for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Root layout component that wraps pages with Header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/product/FilterSi: Filterable sidebar for catalog with category checkboxes and price range slider. Renders as a card on desktop and a sheet drawer on mobile, with clear all functionality.
frontend/src/components/product/GiftPack: Displays a gift pack card with image carousel, discount badge, pricing, and add-to-cart functionality. Navigates to gift pack detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductG: Renders a grid of GiftPackCard components with add-to-cart handling. Shows empty state when no gift packs are available.
frontend/src/components/profile/OrderHis: Displays individual order details including status, payment status, total amount, and expandable item list. Formats dates and shows order metadata.
Fetches and displays user order history sorted by date. Shows loading skeletons, error states, and empty state when no orders exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication via Internet Identity. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.tsx: Provides admin authentication context with hardcoded credentials (admin/admin). Manages session state in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages shopping cart state with localStorage persistence and backend synchronization. Handles add, update, remove operations and calculates totals with coupon support.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: React Query hook to fetch all categories from the backend actor. Enabled only when actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryMutation.t: Provides mutations for creating and updating categories with automatic query invalidation. Update functionality is a placeholder pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Mutation hook for submitting contact form data to the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoupon.ts: Provides coupon validation mutation and discount calculation utility. Validates coupon codes via backend and computes percentage-based discounts.
frontend/src/hooks/useCouponMutation.ts: Provides React Query mutations for creating and updating coupons, plus a query hook for fetching all coupons (currently returns empty array as backend method is not implemented).
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomProducts.ts: Exports a React Query hook to fetch all custom products from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPackMutation.t: Provides React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting gift packs with toast notifications and query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPacks.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching all gift packs, filtered gift packs by catalog filters, and individual gift packs by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication provider and hook for managing user login, logout, identity state, and login status with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrder.ts: Provides a React Query mutation hook for creating orders with cart items, delivery details, payment info, and optional coupon codes.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Exports a React Query hook to fetch the authenticated user's order history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderManagement.ts: Provides admin hooks for fetching all orders (sorted by creation date) and updating order status with toast notifications.
Exports a React Query hook to fetch and sort all Razorpay payments by payment ID in descending order.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutation.ts: Provides React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting custom products (delete not yet implemented in backend).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a mutation hook to initialize backend data and invalidate gift pack queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRazorpay.ts: Provides a hook to initiate Razorpay payment flow with order details, handling success/failure callbacks and payment processing state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Exports hooks for fetching the authenticated user's profile and updating profile information including name, email, phone, address, and pincode.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (terracotta, sage green, cream) for light and dark modes, including CSS custom properties for theming and typography utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login page with form validation for username/password authentication, displaying error messages and redirecting to admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page containing management sections for orders, payments, products, categories, coupons, and gift packs with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with quantity controls, custom messages, wrapping options, and cart summary with navigation to checkout or empty state.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Gift pack catalog page with search functionality, filter sidebar, and product grid displaying filtered results with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page handling authentication, address entry, coupon application, order creation, and Razorpay payment integration with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with validation for name, email, phone, and message fields. Uses react-hook-form and displays success/error alerts after submission.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPackPage.tsx: Multi-step custom gift pack builder with 5 steps: basket type, size, product selection, packing type, and message card. Includes step navigation, validation, and cart integration.
frontend/src/pages/GiftPackDetailPage.ts: Gift pack detail page displaying product images with carousel, pricing with discounts, and add-to-cart functionality. Includes loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights (curated collections, personalization, delivery), and featured gift packs display. Includes navigation to catalog and custom pack builder.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page displaying order ID, estimated delivery date, and payment status. Retrieves payment ID from sessionStorage and provides navigation back to home or orders.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page component with form for editing personal details and delivery address, includes pincode serviceability checking, order history section, and Internet Identity authentication requirement.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Razorpay payment gateway integration, including options, response, and instance interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation utility functions for pincode (6 digits) and phone number (10 digits) formats, with placeholder for delivery availability checking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (terracotta, sage, cream), typography settings, animations, and design system tokens using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting existing features for gift pack navigation and detail pages, with one pending feature request to make gift pack tiles clickable.
